segment.source: Get file properties
segment.target: Get file properties

segment.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]

segment.source: Important APIs
segment.target: Important APIs

segment.source: StorageFile.GetBasicPropertiesAsync
segment.target: StorageFile.GetBasicPropertiesAsync

segment.source: StorageFile.Properties
segment.target: StorageFile.Properties

segment.source: StorageItemContentProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync
segment.target: StorageItemContentProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync

segment.source: Get properties—top-level, basic, and extended—for a file represented by a StorageFile object.
segment.target: Get properties—top-level, basic, and extended—for a file represented by a StorageFile object.

segment.source: Note Also see the File access sample.
segment.target: Note Also see the File access sample.

segment.source: Prerequisites
segment.target: Prerequisites

segment.source: Understand async programming for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps
segment.target: Understand async programming for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps

segment.source: You can learn how to write asynchronous apps in C\# or Visual Basic, see Call asynchronous APIs in C\# or Visual Basic.
segment.target: You can learn how to write asynchronous apps in C\# or Visual Basic, see Call asynchronous APIs in C\# or Visual Basic.

segment.source: To learn how to write asynchronous apps in C++, see Asynchronous programming in C++.
segment.target: To learn how to write asynchronous apps in C++, see Asynchronous programming in C++.

segment.source: Access permissions to the location
segment.target: Access permissions to the location

segment.source: For example, the code in these examples require the picturesLibrary capability, but your location may require a different capability or no capability at all.
segment.target: For example, the code in these examples require the picturesLibrary capability, but your location may require a different capability or no capability at all.

segment.source: To learn more, see File access permissions.
segment.target: To learn more, see File access permissions.

segment.source: Getting a file's top-level properties
segment.target: Getting a file's top-level properties

segment.source: Many top-level file properties are accessible as members of the StorageFile class.
segment.target: Many top-level file properties are accessible as members of the StorageFile class.

segment.source: These properties include the files attributes, content type, creation date, display name, file type, and so on.
segment.target: These properties include the files attributes, content type, creation date, display name, file type, and so on.

segment.source: Note Remember to declare the picturesLibrary capability.
segment.target: Note Remember to declare the picturesLibrary capability.

segment.source: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, accessing a few of each file's top-level properties.
segment.target: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, accessing a few of each file's top-level properties.

segment.source: Getting a file's basic properties
segment.target: Getting a file's basic properties

segment.source: Many basic file properties are obtained by first calling the StorageFile.GetBasicPropertiesAsync method.
segment.target: Many basic file properties are obtained by first calling the StorageFile.GetBasicPropertiesAsync method.

segment.source: This method returns a BasicProperties object, which defines properties for the size of the item (file or folder) as well as when the item was last modified.
segment.target: This method returns a BasicProperties object, which defines properties for the size of the item (file or folder) as well as when the item was last modified.

segment.source: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, accessing a few of each file's basic properties.
segment.target: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, accessing a few of each file's basic properties.

segment.source: Getting a file's extended properties
segment.target: Getting a file's extended properties

segment.source: Aside from the top-level and basic file properties, there are many properties associated with the file's contents.
segment.target: Aside from the top-level and basic file properties, there are many properties associated with the file's contents.

segment.source: These extended properties are accessed by calling the BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync method.
segment.target: These extended properties are accessed by calling the BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync method.

segment.source: (A BasicProperties object is obtained by calling the StorageFile.Properties property.) While top-level and basic file properties are accessible as properties of a class—StorageFile and BasicProperties, respectively—extended properties are obtained by passing an IEnumerable collection of String objects representing the names of the properties that are to be retrieved to the BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync method.
segment.target: (A BasicProperties object is obtained by calling the StorageFile.Properties property.) While top-level and basic file properties are accessible as properties of a class—StorageFile and BasicProperties, respectively—extended properties are obtained by passing an IEnumerable collection of String objects representing the names of the properties that are to be retrieved to the BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync method.

segment.source: This method then returns an IDictionary collection.
segment.target: This method then returns an IDictionary collection.

segment.source: Each extended property is then retrieved from the collection by name or by index.
segment.target: Each extended property is then retrieved from the collection by name or by index.

segment.source: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, specifies the names of desired properties (DataAccessed and FileOwner) in a List object, passes that List object to BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync to retrieve those properties, and then retrieves those properties by name from the returned IDictionary object.
segment.target: This example enumerates all of the files in the Pictures library, specifies the names of desired properties (DataAccessed and FileOwner) in a List object, passes that List object to BasicProperties.RetrievePropertiesAsync to retrieve those properties, and then retrieves those properties by name from the returned IDictionary object.
